content:
Register on the App

  1. Install the Choice FinX App (Android & iOS) and on the Login Page click on ‘Create Account’.
  2. Enter the below following details of the user & Click on Submit
    1. Name (Compulsory)
    2. Mobile Number (Compulsory)
    3. City (Compulsory)
    4. Email ID
    5. Referral ID (If any)
  3. Enter & verify the OTP number received on your registered mobile number.
  4. Keep the below-mentioned documents/details ready in soft copy:
    1. Address Proof
    2. PAN Card
    3. Cancelled Cheque 
    4. Photograph 
    5. Signature on a White Paper
    6. Income Proof
  5. Enter your Permanent Account Number (PAN) & Date of Birth & Click on Next
  6. Upload/Click an image of your PAN Card and enter your basic details.
    1. Email ID
    2. Mobile Number
    3. Date of Birth
    4. Permanent Account Number (PAN) 
    5. Aadhaar Number (Optional)
  7. Enter your Basic Details.
    1. Full Name
    2. Father's Name
    3. Mother’s name
    4. Aadhaar Number
    5. Birthplace
    6. Gender
    7. Marital Status
    8. Select box if you are affiliated to any political party
    9. Select box if you wish to add a nominee
  8. Enter your Address Details (In case it is not fetched from KRA (KYC Registration Agency ) i.e PAN )
    1. Address
    2. City
    3. State
    4. Postal Zip Code
  9. If you’ve opted to add a nominee, then enter the following details.
    1. Nominee Name
    2. Relation 
    3. Select box if the nominee address is same as your permanent address
    4. Select box if the nominee is a minor
  10. Select your Economic Details.
    1. Income Slab 
    2. Occupation
    3. Educational Qualification
    4. Previous Trading Experience
  11. Upload/Click an image of your Cancelled Cheque/Pass Book (Please ensure it has your Name, IFSC & MICR) and enter the following bank details.
    1. Account Number
    2. IFSC Code (If you don’t know your IFSC. You can choose to search by the bank name or branch name by clicking on the ‘Click Here’ link next to ‘Don’t Remember IFSC Code?’)
    3. Bank Postal Zip Code
    4. Select if you have a Savings/Current Account
  12. Select the segment you want to trade in
    1. Equity/Derivatives - (NSE Cash, BSE Cash, NSE F&O and BSE F&O)
    2. Currency - (NSE Currency and BSE Currency)
    3. Commodities - (MCX and NCDEX)
  13. For In-Person Verification
    1. Write down the OTP mentioned on the screen, on a clear white paper
    2. Click and upload a selfie with the paper, ensuring that your face and the OTP are clearly visible
  14. Upload/Click an image of the following KYC relevant documents
    1. Income Proof (last 6 months of bank statement or latest ITR statement or latest salary statement or DP Holding statement)
    2. Images of both sides of your Aadhaar card
    3. Photograph
    4. Signature on a White Paper
  15. You can choose to opt for eSign here.
    1. On selecting NO, you will have to courier all the documents to us as well as the signed copy of your POA and the prefilled forms that will be mailed on your registered email address
    2.  On selecting YES, you will be directed to the eSign page, where you have to enter your Aadhaar number and request for OTP. Enter the OTP and click on the Submit Button

Once you complete registering with Choice FinX, you’ll be asked to share your feedback regarding your onboarding experience. Once this is done, you will receive a Thank You message informing you of the documents that will be required from you. On selecting ‘Continue’, you will be redirected to the Choice FinX Login Page.
